titles.title: To extend the period for beneficiaries of certain deceased members of the uniformed services to apply for a death gratuity under the Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance policy of such members.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 6/4/1998--Introduced. Extends through September 30, 1996, the period during which beneficiaries of veterans who died in the line of duty on or after October 29, 1992, may apply to the Department of Veterans Affairs for a death gratuity under Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance.
